about_the_game:
MEET BLANCHE!

Zodiac: Aquarius

Preferences: Sexual role-play, anal sex, double penetration.

Blanche is a closed book, the kind who keeps her cards close to her chest. She's as tough as nails, with a sharp wit that cuts as deep as her blade. Trust doesn’t come easily to her, and she has a hard time connecting with others. Most of the time, she merely uses people — emotionally, physically, and even sexually.

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING

From now on, Blanche will not only be your trusted companion but also your inspiring muse! She will accompany you on the main screen with dynamic animations and intriguing dialogues.

By purchasing this DLC, you'll get Blanche as a mascot. You can switch mascots anytime by opening your profile and selecting the "Mascots" tab.

Additionally, you'll receive 5000 credits and 150 super serum.

Most importantly, you'll have our eternal gratitude! Thank you for considering purchasing this DLC!

content_descriptors.notes: All characters in the game are over 20 years old. This DLC contains explicit adult themes, including nudity and sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

name: Lust Goddess — Mascot Blanche
short_description: Unlock a unique mascot, Blanche, to entertain you every time you visit the main screen! Enjoy Lust Goddess with this super sidekick and some extra resources to boost your progress.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
